page.title: 13Local News.
page.content: In our area in the South West of Dumfries and Galloway, the{local news} is printed in the "Wigtown Free Press" and the "Galloway Gazette". { {newspapers.}These papers are printed in the towns of Newton Stewart and Stranraer. Our{local radio}station is called "Radio Solway" and is broadcast from Dumfries. These three {media}sources keep the inhabitants of Galloway fairly well informed of all the forthcoming events, births, marriages, deaths, jobs, accidents, tide times, crime, competition winners, doctors on duty, houses for sale and advertisements. Between the 16th and the 19th of June the "Royal Highland Show" was held in Ingliston near Edinburgh. A local farmer called Mr. Templeton, showed fleeces and won 4th prize.Mr Ramsay showed Clydesdale horses.
